title: 95/17/EC: Commission Decision of 2 February 1995 on the recognition of the producer group for hops in northern France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 2 February 1995 on the recognition of the producer group for hops in northern France (Only the French text is authentic) (95/17/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: France is hereby authorized to recognize the Coophounord producer group pursuant to Article 2 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1351/72.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 February 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 30. 6. 1972, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 363, 23. 12. 1987, p. 27.
